tool_description: An API showing all the latest F1 news from different sources.
name: Formula 1 Live
title: Formula 1 Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source New
api_list.description: This endpoint shows news from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://formula-1-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "formula-1-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://formula-1-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "formula-1-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Formula 1 News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Formula 1 from all sources used.
api_list.code:
